verses.t: Unto thee will I cry{H7121}, LordO {H3068} my rock{H6697}; be not silent{H2814} to me: lest, ifthou be silent{H2790} to me, I become{H4911} like them that go down{H3381} into the pit{H953}.to me: Heb. from me
Hear{H8085} the voice{H6963} of my supplications{H8469}, when I cry{H7768} unto thee, when I lift up{H5375} my hands{H3027} toward thy holy{H6944} oracle{H1687}.thy…: or, the oracle of thy sanctuary

Draw me not away{H4900} with the wicked{H7563}, and with the workers{H6466} of iniquity{H205}, which speak{H1696} peace{H7965} to their neighbours{H7453}, but mischief{H7451} is in their hearts{H3824}.

Give{H5414} them according to their deeds{H6467}, and according to the wickedness{H7455} of their endeavours{H4611}: give{H5414} them after the work{H4639} of their hands{H3027}; render{H7725} to them their desert{H1576}.
Because they regard{H995} not the works{H6468} Lordof the {H3068}, nor the operation{H4639} of his hands{H3027}, he shall destroy{H2040} them, and not build them up{H1129}.
Blessed{H1288} be Lordthe {H3068}, because he hath heard{H8085} the voice{H6963} of my supplications{H8469}.

LordThe {H3068} is my strength{H5797} and my shield{H4043}; my heart{H3820} trusted{H982} in him, and I am helped{H5826}: therefore my heart{H3820} greatly rejoiceth{H5937}; and with my song{H7892} will I praise{H3034} him.
LordThe {H3068} is their strength{H5797}, and he is the saving{H3444} strength{H4581} of his anointed{H4899}.their: or, hissaving…: Heb. strength of salvations
Save{H3467} thy people{H5971}, and bless{H1288} thine inheritance{H5159}: feed{H7462} them also, and lift them up{H5375} for ever{H5769}.feed: or, rule
